title: Add framebuffer support (/dev/fb0)
body: First of all, WSL is great! Thanks for this amazing feature!

comments.body:
For starters, it would be great if the (actually existing in windows <= 2003) feature discussed at https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/266908-command-prompt-console-windows-subsystem-for-l/suggestions/6539325-console-graphics-screenbuffers
was first fixed!
AFAIK Windows has no (good) way to access framebuffer even outside WSL environment, so I don't think this will be considered any time soon
